description: Process CTD cast data, calculate sound velocity using Chen-Millero or Del Grosso formulas, and export to industry formats (USR, VEL, PRO, Excel)
author: S7 Solutions
features: Valeport MIDAS SVX2 CTD file parsing with auto-detection
Multiple input format support (Valeport, QINSy, EIVA, CSV, etc.)
Automatic column detection for Depth, SV, Temperature, Salinity, Density
Auto SV formula selection based on depth (Chen-Millero ≤1000m, Del Grosso >1000m)
Data interpolation at regular depth intervals
Real-time data smoothing with multiple algorithms
Export to USR (QINSy), VEL (EIVA), PRO formats
Displays all data rows (no preview limit)
